name: EBMUD Customer Assistance Program
description: 35-50% discount on water and wastewater bills for income-eligible customers
fullDescription: The East Bay Municipal Utility District (EBMUD) Customer Assistance Program provides significant discounts on water and wastewater bills for income-eligible households in Alameda and Contra Costa counties.
whatTheyOffer:
- 35% discount on water and wastewater bills (Tier 1)
- 50% discount for households at 100% federal poverty level (Tier 2)
- Crisis assistance for customers facing shutoff
- Flexible payment arrangements
- Free leak detection assistance
howToGetIt:
1. Check income eligibility (based on federal poverty guidelines)
2. Download application from EBMUD website or call to request
3. Provide proof of income (tax return, benefit letter, pay stubs)
4. Submit application by mail, email, or in person
5. Renew every two years to maintain discount
keywords: EBMUD, water bill, discount, low-income, East Bay, Alameda County, Contra Costa, wastewater, utility assistance
